snippet: MILNER--Sheila. A devoted wife of Saladin Bucak; daughter of Sheila Casey and Michael J. Milner; sister of Michael Milner; and a caring aunt of Paula. Sheila was a conscientious, honest; courageous and outspoken person. She was a dedicated teacher...
lead_paragraph: MILNER--Sheila. A devoted wife of Saladin Bucak; daughter of Sheila Casey and Michael J. Milner; sister of Michael Milner; and a caring aunt of Paula. Sheila was a conscientious, honest; courageous and outspoken person. She was a dedicated teacher who worked for about 40 years in the teaching profession. She was so passionate for the well being of humanity and justice. She was a very dedicated daughter, who took care of her mother for about 30 years. Her mother was suffering from Alzheimer's Disease, which she herself suffered with for about 14 years. Sheila always had a smile and a very positive outlook at life regardless of the difficult times she had to go through. She wanted to help everyone and believed that no matter what; life is worth living, regardless of the challenges we face. Let us celebrate the life of Sheila Milner; and always remember, life is challenging and the future is unpredictable for all of us but we have to make the best of each and everyday we are here. may the memory of Sheila remains in our hearts and minds now and forever.
